props.name: children
props.docblock: The expected text to which the ellipsis would be applied.

description.text: The expected text to which the ellipsis would be applied.

props.name: lines
props.docblock: The number of lines the text to be truncated to.

description.text: The number of lines the text to be truncated to.

props.name: ellipsis
props.docblock: Text content for the ellipsis - will appear after the truncated lines.

description.text: Text content for the ellipsis - will appear after the truncated lines.

props.name: whiteSpace
props.docblock: Adds the whitespace from before the ellipsis.

description.text: Adds the whitespace from before the ellipsis.

props.name: elementType
props.docblock: Custom html element for truncated text.

description.text: Custom html element for truncated text.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: onTruncate
props.docblock: Callback fired when a text truncating

description.text: Callback fired when a text truncating
